Field Detail

items

public java.util.ArrayList<ScreenItem> items
Even if attached to scene, items are part of the background, and stored inside it (idem for areas, anims and exists).

Constructor Detail

Background

public Background(DatabaseHandler dbh,
                  Context context,
                  int screenId,
                  org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                  org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene,
                  org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture.region.TiledTextureRegion elTR,
                  org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture.region.TiledTextureRegion erTR)
Everything is loaded and created directly in the constructor (background, items, animations, areas, exists).

Parameters:
dbh - database handler is stored for upcoming database calls
context - Android context, to retrieve files
screenId - id of the current screen
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas
elTR - texture region of the left exit, to create corresponding animated sprite
erTR - texture region of the right exit, to create corresponding animated sprite
Method Detail

load

public void load(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                 org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads background and foreground (if existing) images and creates every sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, register touch areas and set ZIndexes, and set background boundaries.

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

loadItems

public void loadItems(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                      org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads images and creates every sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, register touch areas and set ZIndexes. Dynamically set images on the BitmapTextureAtlas with posX & posY.

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

createItem

private void createItem(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hm,
                        org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture.atlas.bitmap.BitmapTextureAtlas BTA,
                        int xPos,
                        int yPos)
Create an item object (sprite) with information about its position and allowed actions.

Parameters:
hm - tab with database information
BTA - AndEngine BitmapTextureAtlas to store all item images
xPos - calculated position on BTA
yPos - calculated position on BTA

loadAnimations

public void loadAnimations(org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                           org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Loads images and creates every animated sprites, attach them to the AndEngine scene, register touch areas and set ZIndexes. Dynamically set images on the BitmapTextureAtlas with posX & posY.

Parameters:
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

createAnimation

private void createAnimation(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> hm,
                             org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture.atlas.bitmap.BitmapTextureAtlas BTA,
                             int xPos,
                             int yPos)
Create an animation object (animated sprite) with position and running information.

Parameters:
hm - tab with database information
BTA - AndEngine BitmapTextureAtlas to store all item images
xPos - calculated position on BTA
yPos - calculated position on BTA

loadItem

public void loadItem(int itemId,
                     org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine)
Loads and creates a single item, after a combination of two existing items resulting in another one.

Parameters:
itemId - database id of item to create
engine - AndEngine engine, to load textures

createAreas

public void createAreas()
Stores screen areas the player can interact with.

createExits

public void createExits(org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture.region.TiledTextureRegion TRLeft,
                        org.anddev.andengine.opengl.texture.region.TiledTextureRegion TRRight)
Stores all the screen exists (even these which aren't displayed at first).

Parameters:
TRLeft - texture region of the left exit, to create corresponding animated sprite
TRRight - texture region of the right exit, to create corresponding animated sprite

showStaticAnims

public void showStaticAnims(org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Launches character or landscape animations (looping and not moving animations).

Parameters:
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

launchStaticAnim

private void launchStaticAnim(int animId,
                              org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Launches character or landscape animations (looping and not moving animations).

Parameters:
animId - database id of animation to be launched
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

showExits

public void showExits(org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Displays exits the doll is allowed to use (others will be displayed at run time).

Parameters:
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

hideShowItem

public void hideShowItem(org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene,
                         ScreenItem item)
When an item is taken by the doll, it disappears of the screen; when two items are combined, another can appear on the screen.

Parameters:
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas
item - item object to hide or display

hideShowItemById

public void hideShowItemById(int itemId,
                             org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
When an item is taken by the doll, it disappears of the screen; when two items are combined, another can appear on the screen.

Parameters:
itemId - id of item to hide or display
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprites to scene and register touch areas

hideShowAnimation

public void hideShowAnimation(int animId)
Animation can appear or disappear, depending on the scenario.

Parameters:
animId - id of animation to hide or display

getAnimStates

public int[] getAnimStates(int animId)
For action manager.

Parameters:
animId - id of concerned animation
Returns:
states states[0]=take; states[1]=look; states[2]=talk;

getItemStates

public int[] getItemStates(int itemId)
For action manager.

Parameters:
itemId - id of concerned item
Returns:
states states[0]=take; states[1]=look; states[2]=talk;

getAreaStates

public int[] getAreaStates(int areaId)
For action manager.

Parameters:
areaId - id of concerned area
Returns:
states states[0]=take; states[1]=look; states[2]=talk;

checkAreas

public Area checkAreas(float x,
                       float y)
Checks if there is an existing area at the touched point.

Parameters:
x - touched x (on scene/background, not local screen x)
y - touched y (on scene/background, not local screen y)
Returns:
area touched area, if there is one, or null

addItemOnScreen

public void addItemOnScreen(int itemId,
                            org.anddev.andengine.engine.Engine engine,
                            org.anddev.andengine.entity.scene.Scene scene)
Checks if there is an existing area at the touched point.

Parameters:
itemId - database id of item to add
engine - AndEngine engine, to load texture
scene - AndEngine scene, to attach sprite to scene and register touch area
